features: PUSH BUBBLE TOY: Just push the mower and have fun with bubbles in seconds! No batteries required. As the mower is pushed, it releases tons of incredible bubbles into the air.
REALISTIC SOUND: This adorable toy lawn mower is a fun way to get kids up and moving outside. As the mower is pushed, it plays realistic mowing noises that kids will love.
PROMOTES ACTIVE PLAY: With its realistic design and mechanical sounds, the mower helps to promote pretend play and encourages kids to use their imagination for awesome outdoor play with family.

EASY ASSEMBLY: Parents will love the newly designed bubble wheel with mess-free construction. Assembly is quick is easy. Simply slide the ends of the handles on to the mower, pour in your solution and you're ready to go
body.description: The bubble N go deluxe mower is a fun mower for kids to work like mom or dad. The mower has mechanical gear sounds for more realistic play. Just fill the included bottle with bubble solution, push the mower and have fun with bubbles in seconds. Rugged tires keep the mower rolling along across tough terrain. No batteries required when ‘mowing’ the lawn!Established in 2012, Sunny Days Entertainment, LLC is comprised of a core group of toy industry veterans with the mission of spreading sunshine through traditional, creative play. Our focus is to enhance the experience for consumers in order to expand children’s imaginations and encourage them to unplug and play. At Sunny Days, each toy is designed with safety in mind. All of our toys are thoroughly tested to meet the highest standards possible. We stand by our superior quality and want to ensure complete satisfaction. If you experience any trouble, please reach out to our team so we can make it right.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kids can help around the yard with their very own Bubble Mower!

Give the gift of bubbles! Made to last, this bright and fun bubble machine is lightweight, durable and safe for kids. Parents will love the newly designed bubble wheel with mess-free construction. Give as a gift or use for any event that calls for some extra bubble fun! Young gardeners will have a bubble blast this summer as they help with yard work while creating tons of awesome bubbles! This adorable push mower is great for kids who want to work in the yard just like mom and dad. With its realistic design and mechanical sounds, it helps to promote active pretend play and encourages kids to use their imagination while helping out around the yard. It's easy to use! Use the included bubble solution to fill it up, push the mower and have fun with bubbles in seconds! Rugged tires keep the mower rolling along across tough terrain. No batteries required when ‘mowing’ the lawn! Continuous bubbles fly out when pushed Mechanical gear sounds create the feel of a real lawnmower Encourages pretend play, imagination and exercise Includes 4oz bubble solution

About Sunny Days Entertainment Our History Sunny Days is a leading supplier, distributor, and manufacturer of branded and licensed toys across multiple product categories. We focus on providing fun & affordable toys for children! Our Mission Based in South Carolina, we are comprised of a core group of toy industry veterans with a mission of spreading sunshine through traditional, creative play. Our Toys Each toy is created to enhance the experience for children, expand their imaginations and encourage them to unplug and play. Designed with safety in mind, all of our toys are thoroughly tested to meet the highest standards possible. Our Promise At Sunny Days, we stand by our superior quality and want to ensure complete satisfaction. If you experience any trouble, please reach out to our team so we can make it right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it's cute...it's loud
reviews.reviewText: for the $11 you pay this is super cute and works well! beware though,it's super loud because it actually makes sounds that imitate a real lawn mower when pushed, it comes with a thing of bubbles to start you off which is nice and no batteries needed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: My toddler loves to mow the grass when I do and his last bubble machine was not up to the task for long. I really like that the bubbles are push power instead of battery. Bubble production is very satisfying. My son is 2½ and it is a good size for him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lawnmower Bubbles for Toddler
reviews.reviewText: This is such a nice gift for a toddler. It's extremely easy to put together but it is also well made. The only issue I see is that it works better on a rug and not to well on a wood floor. It may very well work better outside then inside. It's currently raining but I'm certain my grandson will have a great time using it outside. The only downside is that it only comes with 1 small container of bubbles. This is a great gift for any toddler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun for Grandson
reviews.reviewText: My grandson(2 yrs) loves this. The bubbles last a long time but we used them all in one day. He walked with the toy trying to catch the bubbles while laughing out loud. He walked through 4 acres of land. He makes my heart sing. ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nephew loves it!
reviews.reviewText: This was really easy to assemble right in the living room, no spills. You need to "mow" carpeted areas to get the bubbles to go, but definitely works great to have your kid get some gross motor in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Buy bubble refill right up front.
reviews.reviewText: If you tip this too far, the solution leaks all over the place. Make sure to buy a refill right up front to make sure your toddler isn't disappointed when it quits producing bubbles rather quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Realistic ( for a two year old)
reviews.reviewText: Two year old grandson loves his “lawn mower “. He can help grandpa with the yard. Any bubble solution works but do rinse out the well if sitting for a while. Enjoys it with and without bubbles.

My 2 year old grandson enjoys this. No batteries is a bonus. Works great at our cottage property which is NOT a perfectly even landscaped lot! No tipping, propelling or bubble making issues. Easy to assemble, no tools required.
Very happy with the purchase; working well
My 3 year old grandson loves it
Entrenido para los pequeños de la casa lo mejor no requiere pilas y mantiene activo a los niños ya que ellos con el movimiento de la maquina hacen las burbujas
